2.1. Required Packages¶

Following are the packages that you need to install on your machine before starting building your Website.

Please run the below script:

# Update the apt repo

sudo apt-get update

# Install packages.

sudo apt-get install -y libapache2-mod-php5 akonadi-backend-mysql \
ibdbd-mysql-perl libmysqlclient-dev libmysqlclient18:amd64 \
libqt4-sql-mysql:amd64 mysql-client mysql-client-5.5 mysql-client-core-5.5 \
mysql-common mysql-server mysql-server-5.5 mysql-server-core-5.5 php5-mysql \
apache2 apache2-bin apache2-data libapache-pom-java libapache2-mod-php5 \
libapache2-mod-wsgi-py3 libbatik-java libapache2-mod-php5 php-console-table\
php-gettext php-pear php5 php5-cli php5-common php5-gd php5-json php5-mcrypt\
php5-mysql phpmyadmin
